posts.post_content:
Well your opponent will just take the single damage point when you attack with that guy unless there is an [irresistible prey](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=irresistible prey), although it's an interestingly good one-time blocker against a fattie.  
But i agree, that's kind of a strange Zombie.  
Well, i rather have an Escaped Null than a [Mindless Null](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mindless Null) nontheless.

posts.post_content: At first I thought it wasn't all that spectacular, but then I noticed "Lifelink". This guy is rather expensive, but everything is more expensive in this set. I like how his ability can be used offensively as pseudo-evasion, while defensively he can create unproductive attacks for your opponent.
